{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Actiontec |model=R3000 |revision=(1B3) |fcc_date=03/02/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, CPE |fcc_id=LNQR3000 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63138 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |cpu2_brand=Quantenna |cpu2_model=QT3840BC |cpu2_cspeed=500 |cpu2_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F1G08ABAEAWP:E |fla2=64 KiB |fla2_brand=Winbond |fla2_model=W25X05CL |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646E-BCK0 |ram2=128 |ram2_brand=ESMT |ram2_model=M15F1G1664A-ADBG2R |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_module=Actiontec PEQ840H |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip1_model=QT3840BC |wi1_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip2_model=QT2518B |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43602 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=256QAM, BoM, schematics |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ACTIONTEC |default_ssid_regex=^ACTIONTEC$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |oui=00:26:B8 |oui_eth=00:26:B8 }}
:• '''1733Mbps''' - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''600Mbps''' - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2400 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Gigabit Wireless Router with 4x4 802.11ac}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.actiontec.com/products/wifi-routers-gateways/fiber/r3000/}} FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/LNQR3000 LNQR3000] (Mozart) :[https://fccid.net/document.php?id=2541364 User manual] :[https://fccid.net/document.php?id=2541363 Quick start guide] [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2541434 R3000 Circuit/Operational Description] says ''QT1528B'' RFIC but that's a typo. :The [https://fccid.io/LNQR3000/Parts-List/Tune-Up-Info/BOM-2541437.pdf BOM] says ''QT3840BC / QT2518B''. ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.digitalhome.ca/forum/192-bell-aliant-home-phone-internet-iptv/235433-new-fiberop-modem-actiontec-r3000-5.html On '''DigitalHome'''] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Broadband-Carrier-Access/xDSL-CPE-Solutions/BCM63138 BCM63138] @1GHz dual-core ARM Cortex A9 SoC __NOTOC__
